entry.name: CitrixDaaS_ApplicationUsage
entry.technology:
Device Properties:
– Citrix Cloud citrixdaas.api.id – Citrix Cloud API Client ID. citrixdaas.api.key – Citrix Cloud API Client Secret. citrixdaas.customerid – Citrix Cloud Customer ID.
– On-prem citrixdaas.user – The user name in the NetBIOS DOMAIN\User form. citrixdaas.pass – The user password. citrixdaas.usehttps – Optional, connect to the Delivery Controller using HTTPS.
– Both system.categories – Add "CitrixDaaS". citrixdaas.host – Optional, defaults to the device IP when not set.
Notes:
For Citrix Cloud see the "CitrixDaaS_Token" DataSource for details on creating API credentials.
For On-prem add the "CitrixDaaS" category and the user/pass properties to the device monitoring a Delivery Controller (DDC). The user account requires the Read Only Administrator role.

attribute.name: scriptgroovy

datapoint.name: InstancesConnected
datapoint.description: Instances actively connected to a desktop.

datapoint.name: InstancesDisconnected
datapoint.description: Instances disconnected from a desktop, but the session still exists.

datapoint.name: InstancesOther
datapoint.description: Instances with an Other connection state.

datapoint.name: InstancesPending
datapoint.description: Instances with a Pending connection state.

datapoint.name: InstancesPreparingSession
datapoint.description: Instances where the session is in the preparing state.

datapoint.name: InstancesReconnecting
datapoint.description: Instances where the user is reconnecting to the session.

datapoint.name: InstancesTerminated
datapoint.description: Instances where the session has been terminated.

datapoint.name: InstancesUnknown
datapoint.description: Instances where the connection state is unknown.
